projectId.description: The project id of the project to export.

$block: Represents information about a project export.

$ul: **estimatedImportTimeInMS**: Estimated time this project will take to import, can change based on network connectivity and load between
**imageCount**: Count of images that will be exported.
**iterationCount**: Count of iterations that will be exported.
**regionCount**: Count of regions that will be exported.
**tagCount**: Count of tags that will be exported.
**token**: Opaque token that should be passed to ImportProject to perform the import. This token grants access to import this
**message**: A message explaining the error reported by the service.
